02537          } else {
02538             /* Horizontal; just draw it */
02539             gdImageLine(im, p[ind1].x, y1, p[ind2].x, y1, c);
02540             continue;
02541          }
02542          if ((y >= y1) && (y <= y2)) {
02543             int inter = (y - y1) * (x2 - x1) / (y2 - y1) + x1;
02544             /* Only count intersections once
02545                except at maxima and minima. Also, 
02546                if two consecutive intersections are
02547                endpoints of the same horizontal line
02548                that is not at a maxima or minima,   
02549                discard the leftmost of the two. */
02550             if (!interFirst) {
02551                if ((p[ind1].y == p[lastInd1].y) && (p[ind1].x != p[lastInd1].x)) {
02552                   if (dir == dirLast) {
02553                      if (inter > interLast) {
02554                         /* Replace the old one */
02555                         im->polyInts[ints] = inter;
02556                      } else {
02557                         /* Discard this one */
02558                      }
02559                      continue;
02560                   }
02561                }
02562                if (inter == interLast) {
02563                   if (dir == dirLast) {
02564                      continue;
02565                   }
02566                }
02567             }
02568             if (i > 0) {
02569                im->polyInts[ints++] = inter;
02570             }
02571             lastInd1 = i;
02572             dirLast = dir;
02573             interLast = inter;
02574             interFirst = 0;
02575          }
02576       }
02577       qsort(im->polyInts, ints, sizeof(int), gdCompareInt);
02578       for (i = 0; (i < (ints - 1)); i += 2) {
02579          gdImageLine(im, im->polyInts[i], y, im->polyInts[i + 1], y, c);
02580       }
02581    }
02582 }
